name: Free Heart Maker
description:
Create your own romantic or funny heart, which if you want someone you can give now. Choose a heart, will be completed with a background of many elements: hands, feet, hair, clothes, jewel, sports equipment, musical instruments and many other items that await additional user.
When your heart is ready, add a personal message, save it and send it by e-mail or put public facebook page.
In the payed version available much more funny items!
